JobFullDesc: Are you passionate about working in an incredibly fast paced environment and working on problems that don’t have a defined solution?  Do you have experience in the cloud working to deliver solutions to our customers’ most challenging problems?  If so, please read on…We’re looking for a strong technical PM skilled in creative solutions for the mission needs of our Government partners. Azure is the fastest-growing business in Microsoft’s history and is the foundation of Microsoft’s Cloud Services. Continuing this success, Azure has expanded into the Government space with its mission-critical cloud, delivering breakthrough innovation, mission relevant capability, and world-class security to our Government customers and their partners. With world-class security, protection, and compliance, agencies can accelerate cloud adoption with confidence, with cloud solutions ranging from edge to hybrid, and to hyper-scale environments. Azure Government enables flexibility and agility in cloud solutions for our Government customers, providing innovation, advanced analytics, and an open application platform, that provide the building blocks to rapidly develop, deploy and manage Intelligent Edge and Intelligent Cloud solutions. As we drive to be the leading cloud platform in the world, Azure Global Mission Platform Sensitive
